scripts.copy-files: powershell -Command "Copy-Item public/manifest.json dist/ -Force; Copy-Item public/background.js dist/ -Force; Copy-Item public/content.js dist/ -Force; Copy-Item public/options.html dist/ -Force; Copy-Item public/options.js dist/ -Force; if (Test-Path dist/icons) { Remove-Item dist/icons -Recurse -Force }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path dist/icons -Force; Copy-Item public/icons/*.png dist/icons/ -Force"
